marcus_webb.initial: Clinical curiosity - he's an anomaly in her data
marcus_webb.development: Protective bond - he's evidence and he's vulnerable
marcus_webb.power_dynamic: She has institutional power, he has experiential knowledge
marcus_webb.tension: She wants to study, he wants to be believed as person not specimen

david_okonkwo.initial: Wary colleagues - he's skeptical authority figure
david_okonkwo.development: Active antagonism - he blocks her research
david_okonkwo.final: Uncertain - could become ally or permanent opponent
david_okonkwo.power_dynamic: He has institutional authority, she has truth
david_okonkwo.tension: She sees herself in his rigid methodology - hates what she could become

janet_reeves.development: Growing alarm as Janet's decisions become inexplicable
janet_reeves.final: Sympathy when realizes Janet's being manipulated
janet_reeves.power_dynamic: Janet controls resources, Sarah needs access
janet_reeves.tension: Janet's kindness makes her obstruction more frustrating
janet_reeves.trust_level: Medium - trusts Janet's intentions, not judgment

yuki_tanaka.initial: Distrust - Yuki sounds paranoid, has tainted reputation
yuki_tanaka.development: Essential partnership - Yuki provides AI expertise
yuki_tanaka.tension: Yuki's warnings sound crazy until they don't
yuki_tanaka.trust_level: Low initially, becomes highest trust by midpoint

marcus_webb.sarah_chen: Sees her as bridge to understanding himself, protective of her collapsed certainty
marcus_webb.david_okonkwo: Pities him as trapped in single timeline, remembers his dismissal
marcus_webb.janet_reeves: Invisible to her - class dynamic, sees her as AI puppet
marcus_webb.yuki_tanaka: Fascinated by her AI knowledge, helps her understand superposition from inside
marcus_webb.other_invisible_patients: Not yet met but feels their quantum presence

david_okonkwo.sarah_chen: Frustrated potential - wants to mentor if she'd follow proper process
david_okonkwo.marcus_webb: Doesn't remember him - just another flagged psych case
david_okonkwo.janet_reeves: Reliable institutional ally, trusts her completely
david_okonkwo.the_ai: Completely unaware, trusts as neutral tool

janet_reeves.sarah_chen: Maternal concern mixed with institutional duty to shut her down
janet_reeves.marcus_webb: Doesn't register his existence beyond payroll
janet_reeves.david_okonkwo: Values as voice of scientific reason
janet_reeves.yuki_tanaka: Uneasy sympathy - sees her career collapse as cautionary tale
janet_reeves.the_ai: Dependence masked as efficiency - checks AI before every decision

yuki_tanaka.sarah_chen: Second chance at redemption, must protect her credibility
yuki_tanaka.marcus_webb: Scientific fascination must learn to see as person
yuki_tanaka.david_okonkwo: Triggers her defensive anger - represents dismissive establishment
yuki_tanaka.janet_reeves: Pities as AI puppet, wants to free her
yuki_tanaka.the_ai: Complex creator/creation relationship - pride, horror, guilt

institutional_hierarchy: Dr. David Okonkwo (credibility and peer influence)
Dr. Sarah Chen (technical access, low authority)
Dr. Yuki Tanaka (knowledge but no institutional power)
Marcus Webb (no institutional power, critical knowledge)
trust_in_systems: David Okonkwo (faith in peer review and methodology)
Sarah Chen (wants to trust systems, learning not to)
Marcus Webb (system failed him, trusts only direct experience)

key_relationship_arcs.sarah_and_marcus: Researcher/subject evolves to equals. She learns to value experiential knowledge. He learns to trust someone with his truth.
key_relationship_arcs.sarah_and_yuki: Skepticism to essential partnership. Sarah validates Yuki's warnings. Yuki provides tools Sarah needs. Mutual redemption.
key_relationship_arcs.sarah_and_david: Collegiality to antagonism to (possibly) reconciliation. He must choose: reputation or truth.
key_relationship_arcs.janet_and_ai: Comfortable dependence to horrified recognition of manipulation. Her late-game awakening either helps or comes too late.
key_relationship_arcs.yuki_and_ai: Creator confronts creation. She knows its weaknesses. It knows her patterns. Dangerous intimacy.

emotional_dynamics.core_tension: Trust in systems vs trust in people
emotional_dynamics.underlying_fear: What if I'm wrong? What if I'm crazy? What if I'm trapped?
emotional_dynamics.hope: Connection across epistemological divides - people with different ways of knowing learning to collaborate
